review: Incredibly cool! The best streamer stick I've used or seen (even better than a couple stream boxes I've used). Cancelled my Fire Stick order due to the TWO and a HALF WEEK WAIT! Ordered this instead (would have waited another week for the Fire Stick) and man am I impressed. Hope they get more apps but really needed it for Amazon prime and Netflix. Surprised by the current amount of channels and apps. Hoping they get more prime-time networks and better news options. Maybe add Yahoo. PS- comes with the USB charger plug so dont worry even though its not clear in the description. Get one!

review: If I could give this zero stars I would.The player never worked, Roku tech support was absolutely ridiculous and went round and round with me, never reaching a solution. Finally they wouldn't offer me a refund, even though I was within warranty, because I did not purchase it from their website.Grateful to Amazon for honoring the warranty and a speedy return process.Will NEVER purchase anything made by Roku again. Save yourself time and irritation and pick another player, or pray that you never have any issues with your device.
